name: Broligarchy
description: If opponent also has Money suit, end fight giving both a win. (ONE BILLION DOLLARS)

immediateEffect.script: bool opponentHasMoney = false; foreach (var card in OpponentDeck) { if (card.Suit.ToString() == "Money") { opponentHasMoney = true; break; } } if (!opponentHasMoney) { foreach (var card in OpponentHand) { if (card.Suit.ToString() == "Money") { opponentHasMoney = true; break; } } } if (opponentHasMoney) { Player.Money += 1000000000; Opponent.Money += 1000000000; Battle.BothWin = true; Log("BROLIGARCHY! Both players win and receive ONE BILLION DOLLARS!"); } else { Log("No deal... opponent doesn't have Money cards."); }
